nodes.bodyText: @4brunu I notice that the value has been flipped from true to false int the sample code. Is that expected?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -32,7 +32,7 @@ Test serialization of outer boolean types
 // The following code samples are still beta. For any issue, please report via http://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator/issues/new
 import PetstoreClient
 
-let body = false // Bool | Input boolean as post body (optional)
+let body = true // Bool | Input boolean as post body (optional)

nodes.bodyText:
I was also surprised.
That happen after running the pet projects.
The input spec has changed, but I didn't change it.
